text:
e="preserve">Edward Michael Abroms (May 6, 1935 – February 13, 2018) was an American movie and television editor. He was nominated at the 56th Academy Awards for his work on the movie "Blue Thunder". He also received a Primetime Emmy Award for editing the "Columbo NBC Mystery Movie" in 1972. He also directed for the 1978-1979 NBC television series "The Eddie Capra Mysteries". He was born in Los Angeles, California.
Abroms died on February 13, 2018 of heart failure in Los Angeles at the age of 82.
